short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imports listing details from Apartments.com and Zillow into Casabrix search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Casabrix browser extension is a supplementary tool to the Casabrix home and rental search platform. After creating an account and a search on casabrix.com, the browser extension allows you to import listing details from Apartments.com and Zillow into your search.
